options.name: Traces to the First Memory
options.explain:
Overall Damage +10%

[Energy of Mu]
If an enemy exists on the map, attacks it with one of 3 patterns containing the Energy of Mu. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Releases the Energy of Mu. Release damage 30,000%
- Casts Shackles of Memory. Shackle damage 3,333% per cast.
- Casts Dream Collapse. Collapse damage 1,875% per cast.

[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).

[Ice Force]
Attacks deliver Water attacks, depending on your Water Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150: Ice Needle
- 150 to below 250: Ice Breath
- 250 or more: Blizzard
- Inflicts 720, 920, or 1,480% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.
- Blizzard Freezes enemies for 10 sec. (Cooldown: 30 sec.)

Overall Damage +8%

[Guard Counter]
Block an enemy attack with a Defense skill to Hold it for 2 sec.
- Defense Skills: Guard, Sword Barrier, Endure, Weapon Parry, Shield Defense, Divine Shield, and Gun Guard
- Applied on defense within 0.5 sec. of casting a skill.

Physical/Magical damage reduction +20% when countered
